casebody.data:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Stephen E. LAW, Petitioner No. 482 EAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. May 17, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 17th day of May, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the Superior Court's order is VACATED, and this matter is REMANDED for proceedings consistent with this Court's decision in Commonwealth v. Perfetto, ___ Pa. ___, 207 A.3d 812 , 2019 WL 1866653 (Pa. Apr. 26, 2019).
